column1: 1/4 cup Rajma (Large Kidney Beans) soaked overnight
1/4 cup Black Eyed Beans (Lobia) soaked overnight
1/4 cup Red Black Eyed Beans (Azuki) soaked overnight
4 Tomatoes blanched and skin peeled and pureed
1 head Broccoli cut into small florets
handful Fresh Thyme leaves (you can also use parsley or coriander)
3 tablespoon Hung Curd (Greek Yogurt) homemade or as you prefer
2 stalks Spring Onion Greens finely chopped for garnish
1 teaspoon Red Chilli flakes for garnish
2 tablespoons Sweet and Spicy Red Chilli Sauce (Tomato Chilli Sauce)
2 sprig Coriander (Dhania) Leaves finely chopped for garnish
20 Grams Jaggery adjust according to your taste
1/2 cup Green beans (French Beans) chopped and steamed
1 cup Spinach Leaves (Palak) blanched and finely chopped
8 Baby brinjals washed and cut into wedges
2 tablespoons Coconut Oil to shallow fry
10 Green beans (French Beans) cut into 1 inch pieces
2 Carrots (Gajjar) cut lengthwise into 1 inch pieces
1 Cup Green Moong Sprouts boiled and mashed
3 cups Vegetable stock or more as needed
1 Tablespoon Corn flour dissolved in 1 tablespoon water
2 cups Green beans (French Beans) chopped to 1-inch & parboiled
Coriander (Dhania) Leaves as required for garnishing
1 Homemade Pizza Dough divided into 10 lemon sized balls
1/2 cup Cabbage (Patta Gobi/ Muttaikose) thinly sliced
2 cups Green Amaranth Leaves cleaned and finely chopped
1 cup Mandi (leftover water from washing rice)
Extra Virgin Olive Oil for cooking
4 Ridge Gourd (Turai/ Peerkangai) cut into cubes

1 teaspoon Whole Black Peppercorns coarsely pounded
400 grams Button mushrooms or portabello mushrooms

3 Mooli/ Mullangi (Radish) peeled and sliced (5mm thick)
["1 Pack Archanas Kitchen Strawberry Velvet Cake Mix"
1 Brinjal (Baingan / Eggplant) cut into big pieces
20 grams Tamarind soaked in hot water

2 tablespoons Spring Onion Greens finely chopped

1/4 cup Sugar adjust according to your taste

Coriander (Dhania) Leaves as required for garnish
Spring Onion (Bulb & Greens) as required for garnish

1 tablespoon Arhar dal (Split Toor Dal) (soak for 20 minutes)
1 inch Ginger cut to julienned for garnish
10 Green beans (French Beans) ends removed and cut into 1" pieces

or milk to brush the crust
